page.title: 14A DAY IN THE LIFE OF ELIOT
page.content: I woke up at 7:30a.m.For breakfast I had sausages and egg and a drink of Ribina.My Dad went to work at 8:00a.m. he works at Pfizers in Sandwich.My brother Adrian goes to the Simon Langton Grammer School.He left at 8:00a.m.He caught a bus to school.My Mum works at a Technical College in Canterbury.She left at 8:45a.m and took me to school in the car.We start school at 9:00a.m and come home at 3:30p.m. Our lessons included SRA and mathematics we also did some project work.Then we had games outside.Lunchtime is at 12.00. We had meat,potatoes and cabbage,for pudding we had trifle.After school I went to the Mobile Library.I chose "WATERSHIP DOWN","NEVER ENDING STORY" and "THE HOBBIT".For tea I had cress sandwiches.After tea I watched television.I went to bed at 9:00p.m.
